byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

snippet: The activist investment firm plans to disclose that it has taken an 8.5 percent stake in the Manitowoc Company, with the aim of dividing the industrial company in two....

headline.main: Relational Said to Plan Activist Campaign Against Manitowoc

abstract: The activist investment firm plans to disclose that it has taken an 8.5 percent stake in the Manitowoc Company, with the aim of dividing the industrial company in two.
